data.prayer: Father, encourage the 4,033 believers in Shimane to not just be consumers of knowledge but be producers of love, mercy, kindness, and justice.
data.verse: let us not love with words or speech but with actions and in truth.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Shimane, Japan
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the believers in the state of Shimane that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.

data.section_summary: On average, 84 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Shimane, Japan.
data.prayer: Spirit, send your gospel to these.
Father, please, raise up a generation of disciples in the state of Shimane who will make disciples who make disciples.
Father, help your children in Shimane, Japan find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

data.prayer: Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Kunigami people.
Father, put the people who are lonely into families in the state of Shimane.
data.verse: God sets the lonely in families. He brings out the prisoners with singing, but the rebellious dwell in a sun-scorched land.

data.prayer: Father, bring yourself glory in Shimane. Through your servants plant 142 new churches that love you, love one another, and make disciples this year.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the LORD as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Father, may the churches in Shimane, Japan honor local leaders who work hard for the flock of God.
data.verse: Pay careful attention to yourselves and to all the flock, in which the Holy Spirit has made you overseers, to care for the church of God, which he obtained with his own blood.

location.name: Shimane
location.people_groups_list: Turk, Burakumin, Oki-No-Erabu, Miyako, Ryukyuan, Amami-Oshima, Southern
